name: Bob's Milk 2
description:
<center> Bob's Milk 2 </center>

Welcome back to another journey of Bob's Milk! We want you to have the best experince so that is why we have introdcued new mechanics, such as CSGO qauke 3 like movement to make it more skill based! The new game also introduces shooting mechanic, with a slightly glowing AK -47 you can shoot the dead people from over 100m away! We also introduced AI that would move to you and if you touch them, your gone! We also introduce 5 levels, each having there own uniquenesses. Enjoy your stay! 

Play once get addicted!

Beat the owner's record time of 1m12s with proof to unlock a secret game that the owner has been working on for 1 year
